DIA_Maiwen_Q104_WorkForAlbyn_15_00: Do you like the conditions here?
DIA_Maiwen_Q104_WorkForAlbyn_11_01: Not so much. I've never eaten too much, but what they serve us here is a misunderstanding!
DIA_Maiwen_Q104_WorkForAlbyn_11_02: And then there's the stench. They should keep all the waste somewhere further away from the huts, like we did.
DIA_Maiwen_Q104_WorkForAlbyn_15_03: Then I see I don't have to ask you anything...
DIA_Maiwen_Q104_WorkForAlbyn_11_04: A... Oh. Okay, so... if you can get us anything, I'd appreciate it, remember.
DIA_Maiwen_FoundHelp_11_01: I told him... I asked him to take us to Khorinis, not that damn Archolos, but he wouldn't listen.
DIA_Maiwen_FoundHelp_11_02: I knew something bad was going to happen and I wasn't wrong!
DIA_Maiwen_FoundHelp_11_03: Why didn't he listen to me!?
DIA_Maiwen_FoundHelp_11_07: We were supposed to start a new life, away from the turmoil of war. To start a home, a family... why didn't you listen to me, my love...
DIA_Maiwen_FoundHelp_15_08: You should come with us. The others are already in the village. You'll be safe there.
DIA_Maiwen_FoundHelp_11_09: I don't think about being safe right now.
DIA_Maiwen_FoundHelp_15_11: Listen to me! Nothing will bring him back to life, but if you stay here, you'll quickly join him.
DIA_Maiwen_FoundHelp_15_13: Don't talk nonsense. You're cold and there's a lot of wild beasts around.
DIA_Maiwen_FoundHelp_11_14: I can't just leave him here! I have to take care of him...
DIA_Maiwen_FoundHelp_15_16: But then you have to come with us, understand?
DIA_Maiwen_VillageTeleport_Description: Come, I'll walk you to the village. (fast travel)
DIA_Maiwen_VillageTeleport_15_01: Come on, I'll walk you to the village, you'll be safe there.
DIA_Maiwen_Q104_11_02: And how is a woman who has just lost her husband supposed to hold on?
DIA_Maiwen_Q104_11_03: I don't know if I'll ever be able to return to a normal life again.
DIA_Maiwen_Q104_15_06: If you need an activity, maybe I could find you something.
DIA_Maiwen_Q104_11_07: Sure, why not? Anything to stop thinking about the last few days.
DIA_Maiwen_Q104_15_08: Albyn, the village Elder, needs men for manual labor. Do you think you could handle it?
DIA_Maiwen_Q104_11_09: Where I come from, manual labor is the only job I know.
DIA_Maiwen_Q104_11_10: I'll go to him right away.
DIA_Maiwen_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_15_01: Could I ask you a few questions?
DIA_Maiwen_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_15_03: Have you seen anyone suspicious lately?
DIA_Maiwen_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_11_04: Most of the people in this village seem suspicious to me, but... Yes... There was someone.
DIA_Maiwen_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_11_05: I went outside to get some fresh air when I saw some big, broad-shouldered guy.
DIA_Maiwen_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_11_06: I give you my word that even in my hometown it's hard to find someone of similar height.
DIA_Maiwen_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_WhereDidHeG: Where did the broad-shouldered guy go?
He wandered around the back of the inn and near the river for a while. He looked like he was waiting for someone, but through the storm I quickly lost sight of him.
Then I went back inside to warm up.
My brother is missing. I assume he was kidnapped.
Jorn? Who would want to kidnap such a golden man?
That's what I'm trying to figure out.
I hope he finds himself whole and healthy.
DIA_Maiwen_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_When_11_02: In the evening, it was pouring.
DIA_Maiwen_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_When_11_03: Moments after that, an elderly man ran into the inn, he was all wet. It was hard to distinguish whether it was sweat or rain.
DIA_Maiwen_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_When_11_04: He ran to the back room for something and after a moment he ran back outside with the young boy, Viktor.
DIA_Maiwen_Okay_11_02: Yeah, Darryl didn't feel well. We'll be right with you. We just need a minute.
DIA_Maiwen_SQ103_Thanks_11_01: Thanks, I want to go back to the village.
DIA_Maiwen_FoundRune_03_01: One more thing. When we were sitting in that cave, I found this stone.
DIA_Maiwen_FoundRune_03_02: I find it rather... strange. Like it's pulsing with energy. I think you'll get more use out of it than I will.
